channel.title: Nlp on bcdata
channel.description: Recent content in Nlp on bcdata

item.title: Analyzing sentiment and constructing automated knowledge bases for online help chats.
item.description: Mentor: Jeff Epstein, Comm100 Summary Description: The data set provided includes thousands of online chat sessions between support and sales agents of a company and their customers or online web visitors. Each chat log includes [chat transcript, duration times, and customer rating]. We’ve identified some business issues/use cases with suggested solutions for you to solve but you are not limited to the following issues or solutions (get creative! See things we don’t see in with the data that would provide real business value):
